context: Is monster hunter 3 Ultimate for 3ds easy to play?
response: The older Monster Hunter games had a very steep learning curve, but they ease you into the difficulty much more gradually in MH3U. For beginners the controls take a little getting used to but make a lot of sense after a while. Definitely pick up a circle pad pro, though, it was pretty much made just for this game.
